editor:
.pos 0
        .align 4
main:   irmovl stack,%esp
        irmovl 7, %eax
        pushl %eax
        irmovl 5, %eax
        pushl %eax
        call sub
        popl %ecx
        popl %ecx
        rmmovl %eax, res
        halt

sub:    mrmovl 4(%esp), %ebx
        mrmovl 8(%esp), %eax
        subl %ebx, %eax
        ret

        .pos 0x100
res:    .long 0


        .pos 0x200
stack:
